hints.content: Let's count how hand's measured $15\text{ cm}$.

Two students, Simone and Gabriel, have hands that measured $\greenE{15}\text{ cm}$  

So, we place $2$ dots over $\greenE{15}$ on the number line.  

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4e53087c9c6414becedfd5ec740e8a4b98e4a2c6)
Now, let's graph the other measurements on the table.

Here is the completed line plot:

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/9f7ccb91f2a5dcf5b4e4104bb22ea2ed598d623c)

question.content:
The students in Mrs. Dolan's second grade class each measured their hand span.   The students want to make a line plot of the data.  

Student | Hand Span ($\text{cm}$)
:-: | :-: | :-:
Simone | $15$
Lucas | $20$
Jose | $16$
Felipe | $17$
Carol | $17$
Angela | $19$
Gabriel | $15$


**Graph the measurements from the table on the line plot.**   
*Click above the line plot to make dots for each of the measurements.*

[[â˜ƒ plotter 1]]
